Don't waste your time on this dog shit game. Full of hackers and the new "Trust Factor" made it even more unplayable than it already was. You can literally get banned from having random hacker teammates over all I legit think the devs care only for money as a friend of mine got vac banned from "overwatch" even tho he has spend years playing the game never even considered using hacks. Overall review - full of hackers, overwatch will ban you for no reason, the trust factor makes the game unplayable because all it needs is one friend with a ban and you'll be put in matches with hackers resulting in your ban. 0/10 don't waste your time
